input.sentences: i traveled to the city and looked at the water .
everyone stood outside and observed it .
there were many buildings to see .
we stayed at a beautiful motel when it stated to get dark .
output.sentences: Look at how beautiful the city is from out here.
That sure is a beautiful old building.
I bet that one used to be a barracks.
Well, now, that's just silly having a front with no building behind it!
Everything looks more beautiful at night.
